item.title: Happn shows that the east is the ideal location for social gatherings
item.description: Source: Happn. The top 10 Happn hotspots. For those seeking romantic connections in Singapore, heading east might be the key. Happn, a dating app that connects individuals who have crossed paths, has identified the top ten locations in Singapore where users are most likely to find potential matches. With a presence in over 40 major cities globally, including Hong Kong, Happn boasts more than 22.5 million users. The app utilizes real-time geolocation technology to show users individuals they’ve been near, within a 250-meter radius.
